OKTA_OAUTH2_ISSUER.description: The issuer URI of your authorization server, this can be either the tenant itself https://<yourname>.okta.com or a API Access Management authorization server https://<yourname>.okta.com/oauth2/<serverid>

OKTA_OAUTH2_CLIENT_ID_WEB.description: This client id of your OIDC application in Okta.

OKTA_OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET_WEB.description: The client secret of your OIDC application in Okta.

SESSION_SECRET.description: A secret key for session data.

SCOPES.description: OAuth scopes to request on login

BASE_URI.description: The URI which will be used to host the application, normally https://<your app name>.herokuapp.com

DEMO_NAME.description: The brand name to show in the app.
